item.description:
mechaelite:

well, that was new. I am never serious in a forum. I mean is just a forum. Everybody says it’s own opinion there. I can’t force some1 change it.

Forums are srs bzns.

item.title: Example how a Half Life Movie Teaser could be
item.dc:creator: dagrox94
item.description:
Yeah, I was thinking any movie would be through Freeman’s mind… like a camera attatched to his suit so that he could be monitored, and the scientists up in the conrol room could better monitor what was happening… then this recording could be played back and… tada! A movie. But that wouldn’t make sense in HL2, Kleiner would’ve probably made a monitor and updated said recording system so he could tell where Gordon was. I JUST SHOT DOWN MY OWN IDEA.

Read full topic

item.source: Example how a Half Life Movie Teaser could be

item.title: Example how a Half Life Movie Teaser could be
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
blue:

stuff

You realize you’re flaming me while agreeing with my point, right? Silent characters work because they don’t have to physically speak; they can use body language to get their point across.

As for Gordon, he really doesn’t need to speak. His actions and facial expressions would speak for him without making him look like a tool, he doesn’t need to mime everything. And HL had a great, in-depth and imersive story, you just don’t get the entire thing spelled out for you through cutscenes.

Read full topic

item.source: Example how a Half Life Movie Teaser could be

item.title: Example how a Half Life Movie Teaser could be
item.dc:creator: blue
item.description:
JeffMOD:

Has nobody ever heard of Charlie Chaplin? Of course silent characters work. :hmph:

youre an idiot if you think ppl didnt talk in those old movies, they did, with theirs bodies( even ignoring the whole subtitles thing), same goes for wallie, he made a lot of difrent souinds and face experssions. Gordon would have to become either a mime or expressionless, in both cases he would look like a retard in w world where everybody is pretty talkative. And a mime would make the film a joke, when the story seems more a serious one.
Only 2 things count in a movie, the story and acting, and if the main protagonists wont be allowed to act, the movie will be shit, since lets be honest, hl story was never its strong point.

Read full topic
item.source: Example how a Half Life Movie Teaser could be
